channel.title: PS5 on Gamefacts
channel.description: Recent content in PS5 on Gamefacts

item.title: Xbox Series X|S price changes in the U.S.
item.description:
Microsoft explains, “beginning on October 3, we will update the recommended retailer pricing for Series S and Series X consoles in the United States due to changes in the macroeconomic environment”. Microsoft also states that, “pricing in countries outside the U.S. remains the same”.

Each bundle is increasing by $50

  • Xbox Series S 512 $399.99
  • Xbox Series S 1TB $449.99
  • Xbox Series X Digital $599.99
  • Xbox Series X $649.99
  • Xbox Series X 2TB Galaxy Black Special Edition $799.99

Full details here

item.title: PlayStation 5 price changes in the U.S.
item.description:
Each bundle is increasing by $50

  • PlayStation 5 – $549.99
  • PlayStation 5 Digital Edition – $499.99
  • PlayStation 5 Pro – $749.99
